meanings.definition: Farthest to the right within a political spectrum.
meanings.sent1: The ultraright position on the issue was clear and unwavering.
meanings.sent2: She identified as an ultraright conservative in the upcoming election.
meanings.sent3: The ultraright candidate's campaign slogan was 'Right is always right!'
meanings.sent4: His ultraright views were like a wall, unyielding and rigid.
meanings.sent5: The ultraright stance stood out boldly among the other political ideologies.

meanings.definition: Advocating extreme conservative or reactionary views.
meanings.sent1: The ultraright policies aimed to maintain traditional values.
meanings.sent2: Their ultraright beliefs clashed with the more moderate opinions.
meanings.sent3: The ultraright group's potluck featured only classic dishes.
meanings.sent4: Her ultraright stance was a fortress against change.
meanings.sent5: The ultraright ideology was a shield against progress.

meanings.definition: A person or group holding extreme right-wing political beliefs.
meanings.sent1: The ultraright gathered for a rally in the town square.
meanings.sent2: She joined the ultraright organization to support her views.
meanings.sent3: The ultraright members wore matching hats at the convention.
meanings.sent4: In the political debate, the ultraright made their voices heard.
meanings.sent5: The ultraright faction was a force to be reckoned with in the election.
